sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import {Link,useHistory, useParams} from 'react-router-dom' // import {Button,DropdownButton} from 'react-bootstrap' import {baseUrl} from '../../context' import axios from 'axios' import Item from './studentItem' import lodr from './ATB3o.gif' function addStudent() { const{cat}= useParams() const [cate, setcate] = useState(null) const [progress, setprogress] = useState(false) const [name, setname] = useState(null) const [dob, setdob] = useState(null) const [gender, setgender] = useState(null) const [roll, setroll] = useState(null) const [cls, setcls] = useState(null) const [section, setsection] = useState(null) const [admnId, setadmnId] = useState(null) const [phoneNum, setphoneNum] = useState(null) const [image, setimage] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { if(cat==='null'){setcate(null)} else{setcate(cat);setCat(cat)} }, [cat]) const [Cat, setCat] = useState(null) const [item, setitem] = useState(null) const history=useHistory() const submitHandler=() =>{ let formdata = new FormData() formdata.append('name',name); formdata.append('dob',dob); formdata.append('gender',gender); formdata.append('roll',roll); formdata.append('cls',cls); formdata.append('section',section); formdata.append('admnId',admnId); formdata.append('phoneNum',phoneNum); formdata.append('items',item); formdata.append('category',Cat); formdata.append('image',image[0]) //var myJsonString = JSON.stringify(item); setprogress(true) axios({ method: "post", url:baseUrl+'/student/addStudent', data: formdata, headers: { "Content-Type": "multipart/form-data" }, }).then((response)=>{ setprogress(false) history.push('/addStudent/null') }) } return progress ? :

} export default addStudent
